original_text: Delight is not seemly for a fool; much less for a servant to have rule over princes.
korean_text: 미련한 자가 사치하는 것이 적당하지 못하거든 하물며 종이 방백을 다스림이랴

sentences.original_text: Delight is not seemly for a fool
much less for a servant to have rule over princes
sentences.korean_translation: 하물며 종이 귀인들을 다스리는 것은 더욱 그러하니라
